name: Dragon Ball FighterZ And Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 Double Pack
summary:
DRAGON BALL FIGHTER Z 
 
DRAGON BALL FighterZ is born from what makes the DRAGON BALL series so loved and famous: endless spectacular fights with its all-powerful fighters. 
 
Partnering with Arc System Works, the game maximizes high-end Anime graphics and brings easy to learn but difficult to master fighting gameplay. 
 
DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 
 
DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 gives players an all-new Dragon Ball experience: Fly around Conton City with up to 300 other players, face off against super-powered bosses with 6-player teams and create your own character to save the Dragon Ball timeline in style. 
 
UNITE AND FLY THROUGH TIME TO PROTECT DRAGON BALL’S HISTORY!
